pkgmetadata.longdescription: Windsurf is an AI-assisted code editor from Codeium designed to keep developers in flow state with instant, invaluable AI developer assistance. It offers semantic code understanding, intelligent code completion, and other AI-powered features to boost productivity.
Windsurf 是 Codeium 开发的 AI 辅助代码编辑器，旨在通过即时、宝贵的 AI 开发者辅助让开发人员保持心流状态。它提供语义代码理解、智能代码补全和其他 AI 驱动功能，以提高生产力。
